item.description:
Russian Orthodox Church of St.John of Shanghai is inviting the children to decorate their own Gingerbread Houses and to participate in holiday fair. Cost of the activity is $25. Proceeds will benefit the parish.

To guarantee a Gingerbread House please sign up by November 28 by calling matushka Larissa 415-793-3058 or e-mailing biba.belikow@gmail.com. Space is limited!
item.how_to_find_us: Parish or St.John of Shanghai, 162 Edgell Road, Framingham, MA

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Decorate your own Gingerbread House
